The Wim and Lia van Leer Award for High School Students
The Oscars of High School Film Departments in Israel
Cinematheque 1
The Wim and Lia van Leer Award for High School Students
The Youth Film Competition, founded in 1991 in memory of Wim van Leer, will be held for the 25th consecutive year at the Jerusalem Film Festival.The competition, which provides a first opportunity for students specializing in film from around the world to screen their works, has become an important festival tradition.Every year, over 100 films, both dramas and documentaries, are submitted to the competition, reflecting young people's experiences, desires, fears, loves and values...
